roleset.name: expand and contract; in an up and down or on and off manner

example.name: The peripheral pulse is the series of waves of arterial pressure caused by left ventricular systoles as measured in the limbs. This is to be considered an extension of arg 1

roleset.note: Based on Temprel data. Comparison to pulse.01. Pulse.01-v is a member of VN class modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3. No FN class. Framed by Katie.
